Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/19/2015...
Had first career hit on 4/29/2015, off Demetrio Kabas (NY)...
Struck out 16 batters against New York on 5/29/2016...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,578,571 through salary arbitration...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2017, going 3-1, 1.54...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,714,286 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Brooklyn to Cincinnati on 5/1/2018 (Going to BRO: P Tim Zimmermann, 2B Estanis Aguilar, LF Andre Winston, 1B Frederick Wansley, P Willie Dubois. Going to CIN: P Fernando Cantu)...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/2/2018 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,714,286 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
9/11/2019: Signed a contract extension with Cincinnati, $14,500,000 per year, for 5 years.
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2020...
Traded from Cincinnati to Brooklyn on 2/13/2021 (Going to CIN: P Marcelo Guzman, P Celso Resto, P Imotoku Kyoden. Going to BRO: P Fernando Cantu)...
Injured on 4/26/2021 with a Tender Elbow, out for one week...
